sentence.Network_en: But later, because of Kotoko's encouragement and advice, he decides to become a doctor.
sentence.Network_cn: 但后来, 由于琴子的鼓励和建议, 他决定成为一名医生.

auth_sentence.content: Algerians JS Kabylie took their own revenge on Ghana's Asante Kotoko beating them 2-0 on an artificial pitch in Tizi Ouzou.
